# 树莓派计算机视觉编程（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shumei-pai-jisuanji-shijue-biancheng-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shumei-pai-jisuanji-shijue-biancheng-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shumei-pai-jisuanji-shijue-biancheng-chuyi
shumei-pai-jisuanji-shijue-biancheng-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shumei-pai-jisuanji-shijue-biancheng-chuyi
shumei-pai-jisuanji-shijue-biancheng-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
